channel.title: Kali live boot on macbook M1
channel.description:
Hey fam, I've been searching around but found nothing. I've tried to live boot Kali on my Macbook Pro (Intel i9), I did it but the trackpad, keyboard and wifi didn't worked. I read something about needing to install some drivers but how I'll use terminal, internet or anything without typing. I don't have a cable keyboard. I could get it If it was the only problem. I can only use the cursor with my dongle mouse.
I'm getting back to M1 chip so the problem will be the same I'm sure.
Do y'all have any solution for runnin Kali live boot on M1 without tons of adapters (ext keyboard, mouse, wifi dongle)? I just want to plug and play. Thank y'all!!

item.title: Kali live boot on macbook M1
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
item.source: Kali live boot on macbook M1
